name: Danger Freak
overview: You are a stuntman and have to perform death-defying stunts, like riding a motorcycle avoiding obstacles and jumping on ramps, driving a car and jumping onto a helicopter before your car crashes against a wall, and later continue around on jetskis. Every time you mess a trick up, the scene has to be cut. If there are too many cuts, you'll lose a "life". Graphics aren't very good unfortunately. Sound isn't that much better: the intro tune is poor and the in-game FX aren't really anything in the way of a step up. Not Rainbow Arts' finest. A surprisingly sub-standard quality product from a company famed for raising standards.
